name: Hunter Master
description:
Description

A game still in development that aims to simulate hunting accurately.

The game is based on small missions, each time you start a game you will have a certain amount of time to hunt a certain number of animals that belong to a species or generic.

Next updates features

In the next update, I will add rewards per level, which can be new weapons, or in-game money to buy new weapons, talent points to improve the character, and more maps.

The following animals are featured in the game, And they divide into hostile and friendly animals:

  • Chicken, boar, goat, cattle, ibex, rabbit, deer.
  • Wolf, bear.

More will be added.

I really appreciate advice and constructive criticism to improve my games

System requirements

RAM: 4gb

disk space: 400mb
